text: Delia Ramirez (born June 2, 1983) is an American politician. She is the member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Illinois's 3rd congressional district since 2023. Ramirez was a member of the Illinois House of Representatives for the 4th district from 2018 to 2023. She was the first Guatemalan American elected to the Illinois General Assembly. She was the Democratic nominee for the United States House of Representatives to represent Illinois' 3rd congressional district in 2022. She won the November 2022 general election. Ramirez is the daughter of immigrants from Guatemala. She was raised in Chicago's Humboldt Park neighborhood. She studied at Northeastern Illinois University. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Delia Ramirez
